mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (USER_ID_NO, ORDER_NUMBER, RECEIVER_NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, ORDER_REQUIRED, ORDER_STATUS, PAYMENT_METHOD) VALUES ( #{userIdNo}, #{orderNumber}, #{receiverName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{orderRequired}, #{orderStatus}, #{paymentMethod} );
mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, #{productCount} as PRODUCT_COUNT, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, i1.IMAGE_URL FROM product p JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = (SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID)

SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, c.PRODUCT_PRICE, c.PRODUCT_COUNT, c.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, i1.IMAGE_URL FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = (SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID) AND c.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo};
